hiveArticle.title: BeautifulSunday and GoldenHourPhotography - Sunset in Bangalore, India
hiveArticle.body:
Again one more Sunset photo, as I love Sunset :P. This image was taken by my Nokia 6 Smartphone in Bangalore, India.
![IMG_20180112_183105_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTx4ZJkqq1NXj7dyGuwxoq1PUCAjtGFxKwAzezCWBKXuP/IMG_20180112_183105_2.jpg)
